00052 /*
00053  * Error codes
00054  */
00055 #define SDB_OK      0
00056 #define SDB_E_CURL_INIT_FAILED  -1
00057 #define SDB_E_OPEN_SSL_FAILED  -2
00058 #define SDB_E_CAPACITY_TOO_SMALL -3
00059 #define SDB_E_INVALID_SIGNATURE_VER -4
00060 #define SDB_E_URL_ENCODE_FAILED  -5
00061 #define SDB_E_NOT_INITIALIZED  -6
00062 #define SDB_E_ALREADY_INITIALIZED -7
00063 #define SDB_E_INVALID_XML_RESPONSE -8
00064 #define SDB_E_INVALID_ERR_RESPONSE -9
00065 #define SDB_E_INVALID_META_RESPONSE -10
00066 #define SDB_E_FD_ERROR    -11
00067 #define SDB_E_INTERNAL_ERROR  -12
00068 #define SDB_E_AWS_INTERNAL_ERROR_2 -13
00069 #define SDB_E_CURL_INTERNAL_ERROR -14
00070 #define SDB_E_RETRY_FAILED   -15
00071 
00072 #define SDB_CURL_ERROR(code)  (-1000 - (code))
00073 #define SDB_CURLM_ERROR(code)  (-1500 - (code))
00074 #define SDB_AWS_ERROR(code)   (-2000 - (code))
00075 
00076 #define SDB_AWS_NUM_ERRORS   41
00077 #define SDB_AWS_ERROR_NAME(code) ((code) > -2000 || (code) <= (-2000 - SDB_AWS_NUM_ERRORS) ? "UnknownError" : SDB_AWS_ERRORS[-((code) + 2000)])
00078 extern const char* SDB_AWS_ERRORS[];
00079 
00080 #define SDB_E_AWS_ACCESS_FAILURE       -2000
00081 #define SDB_E_AWS_AUTH_FAILURE        -2001
00082 #define SDB_E_AWS_AUTH_MISSING_FAILURE      -2002
00083 #define SDB_E_AWS_FEATURE_DEPRECATED      -2003
00084 #define SDB_E_AWS_INTERNAL_ERROR       -2004
00085 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_ACTION       -2005
00086 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_BATCH_REQUEST      -2006
00087 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_HTTP_AUTH_HEADER     -2007
00088 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_HTTP_REQUEST      -2008
00089 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_LITERAL       -2009
00090 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_NEXT_TOKEN      -2010
00091 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_NUMBER_PREDICATES     -2011
00092 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_NUMBER_VALUE_TESTS    -2012
00093 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_PARAMETER_COMBINATION    -2013
00094 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_PARAMETER_VALUE     -2014
00095 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_QUERY_EXPRESSION     -2015
00096 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_RESPONSE_GROUPS     -2016
00097 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_SERVICE       -2017
00098 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_SOAP_REQUEST      -2018
00099 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_URI        -2019
00100 #define SDB_E_AWS_INVALID_WS_ADDRESSING_PROPERTY   -2020
00101 #define SDB_E_AWS_MALFORMED_SOAP_SIGNATURE     -2021
00102 #define SDB_E_AWS_MISSING_ACTION       -2022
00103 #define SDB_E_AWS_MISSING_PARAMETER       -2023
00104 #define SDB_E_AWS_MISSING_WS_ADDRESSING_PROPERTY   -2024
00105 #define SDB_E_AWS_NO_SUCH_DOMAIN       -2025
00106 #define SDB_E_AWS_NO_SUCH_VERSION       -2026
00107 #define SDB_E_AWS_NOT_YET_IMPLEMENTED      -2027
00108 #define SDB_E_AWS_NUMBER_DOMAINS_EXCEEDED     -2028
00109 #define SDB_E_AWS_NUMBER_DOMAIN_ATTRIBUTES_EXCEEDED   -2029
00110 #define SDB_E_AWS_NUMBER_DOMAIN_BYTES_EXCEEDED    -2030
00111 #define SDB_E_AWS_NUMBER_ITEM_ATTRIBUTES_EXCEEDED   -2031
00112 #define SDB_E_AWS_NUMBER_SUBMITTED_ATTRIBUTES_EXCEEDED  -2032
00113 #define SDB_E_AWS_REQUEST_EXPIRED       -2033
00114 #define SDB_E_AWS_REQUEST_TIMEOUT       -2034
00115 #define SDB_E_AWS_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE      -2035
00116 #define SDB_E_AWS_SIGNATURE_DOES_NOT_MATCH     -2036
00117 #define SDB_E_AWS_TOO_MANY_REQUESTED_ATTRIBUTES    -2037
00118 #define SDB_E_AWS_UNSUPPORTED_HTTP_VERB      -2038
00119 #define SDB_E_AWS_UNSUPPORTED_NEXT_TOKEN     -2039
00120 #define SDB_E_AWS_URI_TOO_LONG        -2040

00123 /*
00124  * Error-related macros
00125  */
00126 #define SDB_SUCCESS(x)    ((x) == 0)
00127 #define SDB_FAILED(x)    ((x) != 0)
00128 #define SDB_ASSERT(x)    { int ____r = (x); assert(SDB_SUCCESS(____r)); }
00129 #define SDB_SAFE(x)     { int ____r = (x); if (SDB_FAILED(____r)) return ____r; }
00130 
00131 
00132 /*
00133  * Error placeholders
00134  */
00135 #define SDB_MULTI_ERROR    ((void*) 0)

00145 /*

00149 #define SDB_R_DOMAIN_LIST   1
00150 #define SDB_R_DOMAIN_METADATA  2
00151 #define SDB_R_ATTRIBUTE_LIST  3
00152 #define SDB_R_ITEM_LIST    4

00166 struct sdb_response_internal;
00167 
00168 
00172 typedef void* sdb_multi;
00173 
00174 
00178 struct sdb_domain_metadata
00179 {
00180  long timestamp;    // The date and time the metadata was last updated.
00181  long item_count;   // The number of all items in the domain.
00182  long attr_value_count;  //  The number of all attribute name/value pairs in the domain.
00183  long attr_name_count;   // The number of unique attribute names in the domain.
00184  long item_names_size;   // The total size of all item names in the domain, in bytes.
00185  long attr_values_size;   // The total size of all attribute values, in bytes.
00186  long attr_names_size;   // The total size of all unique attribute names, in bytes. 
00187 };
00188 
00189 
00193 struct sdb_attribute
00194 {
00195  char* name;
00196  char* value;
00197 };
00198 
00199 
00203 struct sdb_item
00204 {
00205  char* name;
00206  int size;
00207  struct sdb_attribute* attributes;
00208 };
00209 
00210 
00214 struct sdb_response
00215 {
00216  // Result
00217  
00218  int size;
00219  int has_more;
00220  
00221  int type;
00222  
00223  union {
00224   char** domains;
00225   struct sdb_domain_metadata* domain_metadata;
00226   struct sdb_attribute* attributes;
00227   struct sdb_item* items;
00228  };
00229  
00230  
00231  // Errors
00232  
00233  int error;
00234  char* error_message; 
00235  int num_errors;
00236  
00237  
00238  // Metadata
00239  
00240  double box_usage;
00241  
00242  
00243  // Metadata specific to the multi interface
00244  
00245  sdb_multi multi_handle;
00246  int return_code;
00247  
00248  
00249  // Internal data
00250  
00251  struct sdb_response_internal* internal;
00252 };
00253 
00254 
00258 struct sdb_multi_response
00259 {
00260  int size;
00261  struct sdb_response** responses;
00262 };
00263 
00264 
00268 struct sdb_statistics
00269 {
00270  long long bytes_sent;
00271  long long bytes_received;
00272  long long http_overhead_sent;
00273  long long http_overhead_received;
00274  long long num_commands;
00275  long long num_puts;
00276  long long num_retries;
00277  long double box_usage;
00278 };
